meanings.definition: The highest point along a ridge.
meanings.sent1: From the ridgetop, we could see the entire valley below.
meanings.sent2: Hiking to the ridgetop was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The birds perched on the ridgetop seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The sun set behind the ridgetop, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The ridgetop stood like a crown on the ridge, commanding attention.

meanings.sent1: The ridgetop offered stunning views of the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent2: We set up camp on the ridgetop to enjoy the cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The ridgetop was the perfect spot for a picnic with a view.
meanings.sent4: As we reached the ridgetop, a sense of accomplishment washed over us.
meanings.sent5: The ridgetop was a natural lookout point, ideal for spotting wildlife.
